segments.text: Mary , can you tell me how you keep in shape ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: You'll never be in shape until you eat less and take more exercise .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Now , tell me what you often eat .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I often eat fish and eggs .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Do you eat a lot of vegetables ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Oh yes , and fruits . I love fruits very much .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: What do you like to drink ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Well , I never drink alcohol , coffee or tea .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Whatever would you like to drink ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I drink a lot of milk . I drink milk almost every day .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: It's a good diet and a regular exercise .
segments.speaker: S1
